column1: Funeral services will be held Friday
column3: 2015 at 10:00 A.M. at Walker Funeral Home Chapel. Rev. Allen Harmon will officiate the services. Burial will follow at Edgewood Cemetery.   The family will receive friends Thursday
column4: June 11th from 6-7:30 PM at Walker Funeral Home and from the home of Janet Pierce at other times.
